listing.description: Peach Properties in partnership with Boatshed London are delighted to offer this 23m Dutch Barge for sale with London mooring, built in 1915 and completely rebuilt in 2000.No expense was spared in the rebuild and both owners since then have loved this boat and used it regularly for cruising the canals and rivers of Holland. Natural light, space and entertaining are the key parts of this boat that make it such an exciting listing. The open plan galley and saloon has large windows and is a great living space for quiet weekends away or entertaining guests.The large cockpit provides even more space for friends to enjoy the fantastic views over the marina at Limehouse. Both cabins are beautifully appointed with double beds and adjoin to the bathroom which contains a shower cubicle and the washing machine and tumble dryer.The second cabin has a small bunk above the bed for a child. Throughout the boat, there is masses of storage space which is testament to the innovative design that came with the rebuild in 2000.The mechanical and electrical elements of this boat have received the same treatment in terms of money spent and the engine room is huge - there is a also small workshop in there. The 136HP daf engine was installed in 2008 and the owner tells me that it runs incredibly smoothly and barely uses any fuel. There is also a generator for longer trips away and a diesel powered central heating system.The mooring at Limehouse is transferable to the new owner after payment of a 5% fee to the marina management. Current mooring fees are roughly ??12,000 p.A.
listing.short_description: Peach Properties in partnership with Boatshed London are delighted to offer this 23m Dutch Barge for sale with London mooring, built in 1915 and completely rebuilt in 2000.

listing.description: This impressive, six bedroom detached house occupies a double corner plot of southerly aspect, approximately 0.517 acres with 120' frontage, in exclusive, gated Farnborough Park. The vendors have lived in the property for 40 years during which time they have created a family home surrounded by delightful gardens with the added features of heated swimming pool and hard tennis court. The spacious accommodation flows easily and the reception areas lend themselves to family life and entertaining both inside and outside in the garden. The property is offered chain free.The entrance hall, with turned staircase, leads to the drawing room with feature fireplace ready for a log burning stove if required. Parquet flooring has been laid to the hall, drawing room and dining room. The highlight of the ground floor is the bright, elegant family room with its American limed oak panelling, limestone floor tiles and fitted bar area. From here there are doors to the garden. The kitchen/breakfast room is fitted with a selection of appliances by Miele and Gaggenau and there is an adjacent covered area leading to the double garage and garden. Double garage and car port.

listing.description: Looking for a 5 bedroom detached home in a gated development, in superb condition and within a short drive of all the areas fantastic amenities? The owners have transformed the space downstairs, by opening up the rooms and adding a large conservatory/family room which overlooks the garden. The kitchen is one of the nicest we have seen for some time and large by-fold doors open out onto the decking with in turn leads to a pergola, perfect for outdoor dining. The space works really well for entertaining, which the current owners do and they have even created a second kitchen in what was the garage to cater for large parties.Other improvements include solid oak flooring, hot and cold air conditioning throughout the house, internally wired surround sound in the lounge, underfloor heating in the kitchen and cloakroom, automatic light sensors, gas central heating and double glazing. listing.description: Once a Victorian farm workers cottage, this unique, four bedroom, attached property is situated in a Conservation Area on the Bromley/Keston borders and offers stylish interior design and beautifully presented accommodation over two floors. For buyers with special requirements or perhaps seeking something that little bit different this property has a spacious, well equipped studio in the rear garden and the benefit of a ground floor, en-suite double bedroom. The creation of this delightful property was completed in 2016 and for the new owner there is little, if any, work required to make this an inviting family home.Approached through the enclosed porch, the reception hall has oak flooring and a cloakroom. From the hall, double doors lead to a large, open plan living/dining area again with oak flooring, log burning stove and bi-fold doors to the garden. The snug has a feature fireplace with stone surround, polished granite hearth and coal effect gas fire. The contemporary kitchen, with breakfast bar, has a five ring, stainless steel, Smeg gas range with hood over, Smeg integrated dishwasher and Bosch fridge/freezer. A deep cupboard has space and services for washing machine and tumble dryer.From the hall, an attractive staircase leads to the landing and generous master bedroom with modern, three piece en-suite shower room. Bedroom two is also a double room and bedroom three is a single. The family bathroom has a three piece white suite comprising shower/bath, designer basin and WC.To the rear of the landscaped garden, the studio could be a gym, an office or an area for entertaining as it has heating, a built-in fridge, freezer and washing machine. There is an en-suite shower room with basin and WC.The garden has two distinct paved areas with a small level lawn in between. There is a pergola to the far end of the garden ideal for outside dining. Outside lighting and power supplies are provided and a garden shed stands to the side. The front garden requires no maintenance and has off road parking for three cars.

Impressive, modern apartment set on the 15th floor within a landmark building in the sought-after Greenwich Creekside development close to Greenwich town centre. The apartment consists of two spacious double bedrooms both with en suite bathrooms, floor to ceiling windows offering far reaching views and the master bedroom benefits from built-in wardrobes. The hallway leads to the amazing open-plan 32'9 x 16' kitchen/reception room where you are greeted with floor to ceiling windows giving 270 degree panoramic views of the London skyline. The room naturally divides itself into a dining and living space and the 'Urban Myth' designed kitchen benefits from integrated appliances and breakfast bar. This area makes for a great entertaining space and gives access to the private balcony. The property also comes with a private allocated parking space. The development benefits from 24/7 concierge, basement bicycle storage and it is located only a short walk from Greenwich town centre and Cutty Sark DLR station (Canary Wharf in approx. 9 mins and Bank in around 21 mins). Please call to register your interest and book an immediate viewing.What the vendor says: "We fell in love with the flat as soon as we saw the stunning views. As a large two bedroom penthouse, with two en suite bathrooms and floor to ceiling windows, we have found it a very light, airy and relaxing place to live. It is also very conveniently located. The DLR, overground and various bus routes are all less than a seven minute walk away, making it very convenient for travelling into Canary Wharf or central London for work. The flat is a stone's throw away from all the amenities of Greenwich town centre, as well as the beautiful park and the historic Cutty Sark and Maritime Museum. It is also very useful having a 24 hour concierge in the building."

Motspur Park br Station is within easy walking distance and provides a regular service to Waterloo in as little as 24 minutes. The nearby A3 offers motorists very convenient access to London and Surrey.DescriptionWith an imposing 29m frontage and sited on a level plot measuring a fifth of an acre, the property can be described as a detached ???Arts & Crafts??? chalet-style bungalow with incredible kerb appeal and delightful features, such as the pillared entrance.The gated carriage driveway is paved with space to park up to 8 cars off-street, and is lined with well-manicured shrubbery as well as beautiful brick and wrought-iron railings.Walking through the front door into the spacious entrance vestibule, the character and quality of the property becomes immediately apparent. From the travertine flooring, the ceiling rose, Venetian-style wall paint and Georgian-style double glazing, it all together bestows a very welcoming, warm and chic ambiance. The hallway is wide, has parquet flooring and carries through the Venetian-style wall paint.The voluminous main reception room offers extraordinary dimensions making it an excellent entertaining and dining space. The reception room has the special wall paint carried through, has a double aspect and feature fireplace. Sliding doors lead out to the conservatory, which is a truly delightful space and has crema marble flooring.Originally designated as the master bedroom, the second reception room offers tremendous space and flexibility. It is being used as a family room by the current owners. It can easily be reverted back to a massive secondary master bedroom on the ground floor and has the added bonus of extra-wide doors. As a bedroom, it also has the advantage of fitted wardrobes and a very smart and high-specification en-suite bathroom which includes a Jacuzzi bath.The luxury kitchen is of outstanding quality featuring spiral column detailing to the cabinetry and chunky double-Ogee edging for the granite worktops. There is also a small dining area ideal for breakfasts. The kitchen has lovely cornice detailing, Crema marble-style flooring, a host of integrated Miele appliances and speaker system. Leading from the kitchen is the utility room which is very organised with plenty of storage space and access to both front and back gardens.Upstairs, the master bedroom suite is of a good size and comprises fitted wardrobes, a study space and luxury en-suite bathroom. There are another two double bedrooms serviced by a shower room.The tranquil rear garden is very secluded and has mature trees and shrubbery. It is approximately 56ft in length and mainly laid to lawn with a patio. The current owners created distinct spaces for relaxation as well as a terrific water feature in the form of a fish pond and fountain ??? making the garden an oasis of calm and serenity. There is also a shed and playhouse.There is good potential, subject to gaining the appropriate planning consent, to extend the property significantly. Subject to planning, it is conceivable to increase the internal area to circa 3,000 sqft.No onward chain.Call now to arrange a viewing.

listing.description: Ivy Gate are proud to present to the market this spacious and well-appointed four bedroom period property in the highly sought after Beverley Ward area of New Malden. This property has been extended to the rear of the ground floor and in the loft to offer an additional two bedrooms in this already well-proportioned family home.This semi-detached home comprises; off street parking, long and bright entrance hallway giving access to the front reception room with bay window. Further down the hallway you come in to the very spacious, unique and open plan kitchen/diner and reception room. This unique space has proved to be a flexible and open space, perfect for families, with the rear extension having sliding glass doors to allow for an unspoiled view of the private rear and South East facing garden once open. This large family space is perfect for a new buyer to put their own stamp on the property and install a layout to suit their own specific needs. Leading off the family room is an extremely useful cloakroom and utility area with appliances, separate WC and access to the rear garden with patio area and the remainder being laid to lawn. There is also two sheds and a childrens tree house as well as side access on the property to get in to the utility room. Leading up the stairs to the first floor is the master bedroom complete with ensuite shower room, a big family bathroom and a second bedroom which has been cleverly split to two rooms to provide a child???s bedroom and separate play area; this could easily be turned back to a large double bedroom with no separation if desired by the new owner. To the second floor lies a further two double bedrooms each with Velux windows.Coombe Gardens is superbly located, being in close proximity to both New Malden High Street and Kingston town centre. Kingston arguably offers some of the best shopping and leisure facilities outside of Central London, with a host of restaurants, boutiques, cinema and theatre complexes. Just a short walk from the property lies Beverley Park, perfect for walking the dog or to take the children for a day out and for the more adventurous outdoor enthusiast there are the vast expanses of Richmond Park and Wimbledon Common just a short drive away. For the commuter, the A3 is a mere 2 minute drive away providing direct links to Central London and New Malden station offers a convenient route to Waterloo in only 25 minutes. There is the added bonus of having the M25 just a 15 min drive away, which opens the door to travel throughout the UK. The property is also within the catchment area of some excellent schools that New Malden the surrounding areas have to offer as well as boasting impressive medical services nearby. We are proud to act as sole agents, and viewing is strictly by appointment only.

listing.description: Key features:1 bed/ 1bath574 sq ftClose proximity to Hanger Lane & Park Royal tube stationsUnderfloor heatingLiving space & bedroom wired to receive Sky+ HD signalFully fitted contemporary kitchen999 year leaseFull description:Life Residential is delighted to bring to market this truly exceptional one bedroom apartment situated within the Royal Waterside development in Park Royal. Arranged over the second floor of the Bodiam Court, this spacious apartment spans an impressive 574 sq ft. Offered with a 999 year lease, benefits also include secure video entry, fitted wardrobe in the bedroom and under floor heating.The Royal Waterside development is situated within Park Royal, set amidst green spaces, elegant waterways and a 20-acre nature reserve. Park Royal and Hanger Lane underground stations are located just a short walk away, whilst the A40 is also close by, offering easy access into Central London and the surrounding areas.
